message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, would you be open to selling it for $115?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget, could you possibly lower the price to $120?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $120, Bob. I'll give you a slight concession to $128, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your offers, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could you possibly lower the price to $125?
I've given you a lot of flexibility, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $129. This is my last offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering all the rounds, could you possibly lower the price to $127?
